pr_title: Create Ample interface method for createDeleteMutation

timeline.bodyText: Is ample not available off of ServerContext? Not sure we need to pass in another param here.
timeline.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: Yes but each call to context.getAmple() creates a new object.  I added it as a param to prevent creating objects in the loop over datafilesToDelete.
replies.author: milleruntime

replies.bodyText: Can't you just create a local object before that loop?
replies.author: ctubbsii

replies.bodyText: Yeah but the code calling this function is in the loop of a scanner and it will create a new object for every entry.
replies.author: milleruntime

replies.bodyText: Perhaps in some future issue, we can make ServerContext hold onto a lazily instantiated Ample object, so we don't have to keep constructing one.
replies.author: ctubbsii

timeline.message:
Create Ample interface method for createDeleteMutation

* Drop static method in favor of method on the Ample interface for
creating delete mutations
* Change GarbageCollectorIT to use Ample for one of the tests
* Reuse Ample object in loops to prevent extra object creation
